tooltip.enigmaticaddons.legacy_future1: §5Possible items that may be implemented in the next
enchantment.enigmaticaddons.frost_aspect: The attack target is gradually freezing.
enchantment.enigmaticaddons.frost_protec: Reduce the damage and influence of frost.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.frost_enchant: Among the common enchantment categories, you have developed several enchantments related to frost.
Frost Aspect - adds a cold aura to your weapon, causing the hit targets to slowly freeze. Of course, it cannot be combined with Fire Aspect.
Frost Protection - Provides protection against frost damage and allows you to endure longer in the cold. It cannot be combined with protective enchantments.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.livingOde1: §5While in your inventory, your attacks can't
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.livingOde3: §5Most animals around you are rendered passive.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.livingOde5: §5- Neutral animals will not actively attack.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.ode_to_living: The previous guidebook seemed unable to make all animal friends recognize you, but this hymn can soothe the emotions of some animal friends. It also inherits the functionality of the previous version of the guidebook.
The content of the ode is still too obscure for you, so you can only carry it with you for any time you need it.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.nightScroll2: §5In the dark, you will receive the following boosts:
Although insomnia is not worth mentioning to demigods, those lurking figures in the darkness are truly annoying, with incessant cries and flying figures. You decide to use their remains to make a scroll.<br2/>The power of the dark night not only scares the Phantom, but also allows you to unleash more abilities in the darkness.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.quartz_ring.p: When you discover quartz in the nether, you surprised by its widespread distribution in the nether. At the same time, when it comes to acquiring new materials, it seems that with your skills, you can create stronger defense rings.<br2/>However, simply exploring physical defense capabilities has already reached its limit for rings, so can we develop some other uses?

Therefore, the addition of lapis lazuli as an enchanting material in the recipe enhances the magic performance of the ring, allowing you to increase your resistance slightly when facing magic attacks. A little is better than nothing.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.earthPromise2: §5health, block this attack and then cooldown
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.earthPromise4: §5- Reduce the effect of the §6First Curse §5by %1$s
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.earth_promise: Whenever you watch the heart of the earth gradually break up in your hand, do you feel excited inside? The mournful cry from the depths of the earth has never become a lingering sound in your ears. But when the power of the cosmic resonates with the heart of the earth in your hands, you seem to have re recognized the true power from the earth.

The earth promise to provide protection and try to block those deadly injuries, but the gold material does not have such high tolerance, so it is important to pay attention to whether this blessing ring is in complete form.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.forgottenIce5: §5- The attack target is gradually freezing
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.forgottenIce6: §5- Freezes those who attack you in melee
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.forgottenIce7: §5- Deal more damage to frozen targets
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.forgottenIce9: §5- You are vulnerable to §dFire Damage§5 and §dFall Damage
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.forgotten_ice: When it comes to Spellstones, names that represent flames, void, and so on will occupy people's minds, but in the distant snowy plains, there is still a force waiting for you to excavate.<br2/>This spellstone awakens the power of freezing, and the frozen air slows down the fast-moving things around it. At the same time, the abilities

of Frost walker and Freezing are also included in this spellstone.<br2/>But the power of frost goes beyond that. This magic stone allows you to discover various flaws that exist in frozen creatures. But like the Will of the Ocean, you should realize that flames are still deadly.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.lostEngine8: §5- Golems will not target you actively.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.lostEngine9: §5- You are vulnerable to §dMagic Damage§5 and §dLightning Damage§5.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.lost_engine.p: When you discover this spellstone, it still silently drives in the corner.<br2/>This ancient spellstone, with engine energy from the old era, can enhance your mobility and resistance, allowing you to increase your power by almost four times after squatting, while also being able to jet air to reduce the impact of gravity. Although it

makes your footsteps heavier, it also greatly increases the critical damage. The rhythm of the engine seems to resonate with the golems around it, which you think is great, especially in keeping the Shulker in neutral.<br2/>Like the Heart of the Golem, magic remains deadly.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.revivalLeaf2: §6- surrounding mobs regeneration, at cost of experience.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.revivalLeaf5: §5- The attack target will be poisoned.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.revivalLeaf7: §5- The surrounding crops are growing faster
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.revivalLeaf9: §5- You are vulnerable to §dFire Damage§5 and §dProjectile Damage§5.
Another unique spellstone that gathers the power of nature can also be found in the ancient jungle temple.<br2/>This spellstone can provide the power of natural: enhance your vitality, slowly restore your health, and immunize you against some minor adverse effects and reasonably regulate bodily functions to make effects last longer.

In addition, it can also extract the deadly part from nature, leaving your hands stained with toxins. This can also resonate with crops, make surrounding crops grow more vigorously.<br2/>However, it should also be noted that besides flames, sharp arrows can easily pierce you.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.etheriumCore4: §5- Convert §6%1$s§5 of the damage received into
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.etheriumCore5: §5  an increase for the next attack.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.etherium_core: One is the Heart of Golem, which can be seen everywhere in the world, and the other is the extremely precious Etherium Armor. By combining the two, you can obtain this spellstone that specializes in physical defense.<br2/>After using the Heart of the Golem as an inexhaustible energy source for the Etherium Shield, you can actively

trigger the shield at any time through this spellstone, without being limited by your health condition. But not only that, the Heart of the Golem has also endowed the Shield with new abilities. It will record the damage you receive

each time, convert and accumulate it, and infuse all its power into this blow in the next attack, repaying it well.<br2/>In addition, unlike other ordinary spellstones, pure ether power seems to have no weaknesses and can be used with confidence.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.dragon_bow.pa: Can Dragon Breath only be used for brewing? You may have thought about this issue. Recalling the ender dragon using its deadly dragon breath to burn your armor and skin, you also want others to experience it. And the strange dragon head hanging on the ender ship that can only be used for decoration...<br2/>Therefore, driven by various
reasons, this bow infused with magic was born.<br2/>This bow can shoot dragon breath arrows without any ammo, but it requires a slightly longer charging time. When the dragon breath arrow

hits, it will turn into a ranged dragon breath and try to retain or chase every person passing by in its way.<br2/>However, one thing to note is that this bow only allows you to utilize the power of the dragon breath. It cannot make you roam in the dragon breath Happily and Foolishly.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.sanguinaryHandbo: §5also receive corresponding effects based on you.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.sanguinary_ha: After a certain period of time, you will definitely feel that the strength of your followers is already too different from yours, and at the same time, the protection provided by the Guide to Hunt is not worth mentioning. So, you came up with a new use for twisted hearts.<br2/>This handbook has equipped your followers with new
abilities, and also receive violent power from you.<br2/>Let them listen to the proverbs in the handbook and selflessly dedicate their lives!
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.falseJustice2: §5- All damage you received will be converted into real damage.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.falseJustice3: §5- All damage you caused will be converted into real damage.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.false_justice: We have no way of exploring what is contained within the Acknowledgment to enable it to endlessly display knowledge. But we can use the essence of the Wither to extract the most chaotic part of  the Acknowledgment to change the rules of the battle.<br2/>At the cost of knowledge, this book begins to emit a chaotic atmosphere.

Now, all attacks related to you go beyond the original rules. Defense? Immunization? In the face of real chaos, it is nothing but an illusion. All you need to do is dodge attacks and give the target an irresistible strike.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.xpTome2: §5The scroll interaction is same as Ageless Wisdom.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.xpTome3: §5Improve your abilities based on experience level,
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.xpTome4: §5But the EXP gained from experience orb will decrease,
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.cursed_xp_scr: When your period reaches a certain stage, experience may not be very useful except for being used for others, but now, through the power of curse, the nature of this scroll has undergone a huge change.<br2/>The greedy curse of ignorance expands the hunting range of the scroll and devours most of the experience gained, leaving you with very little.

Of course, the benefits brought by curse should not be underestimated, greatly enhancing your combat abilities. And please remember that the curse is always waiting for chances. When you are most vulnerable, it will take everything away.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.thunder_scrol: Although the Will of Ocean can partly control the lightning, this is ultimately only indirect control and not fast enough.<br2/>We use the divine power to write spells that resonate with lightning onto scrolls, using spellstone as the foundation and swords as the medium to release the power. During the battle, this scroll will drive you to use sweeping attacks
to expand the target of lightning. At the same time, electric attacks can also make it easier for you to penetrate the influence of armor, allowing you to better face high armor or group enemies.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.hellBladeCharm2: §5- All damage you caused will be doubled.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.hellBladeCharm3: §5- When your damage reaches §6%1$s§5 of the target's health,
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.hellBladeCharm4: §5- causing significant additional damage and heal yourself.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.hell_blade_ch: This charm seems to have been waiting for your arrival somewhere in nether, waiting for you to nurture it with your own blood.<br2/>Anyone who notices the powerful power this charm gives, even if it honestly indicates the cost, will inevitably be tempted to wear it. Generally speaking, these wearers end up with a
very foolish death.<br2/>So, please wear this charm carefully, especially those who bear the seven curses at the same time.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.forgerGem4: §5Two unused tools can forge an§d unbreakable§5 one.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.forger_gem.pa: Forging items is an inevitable step to strength enhancement, but before reach the perfection, there will always be concerns due to expensive costs or anvil breakage.<br2/>This accessory will directly inject ancient forging techniques into your hands, effectively reducing the probability of anvil breakage, and utilizing the energy of
the gem to reduce the cost, thereby increasing the upper limit of forging.<br2/>In addition, exquisite craft also allows you to create some Unbreakable creations with two identical new tools.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.adventure_cha: Creation and destruction are the supreme power of the God, but sometimes it can be difficult to grasp the force well, and a slight mistake can easily lead to unnecessary destruction. And in pure combat, you would prefer to transform this power into more practical forms.<br2/>Now this charm may temporarily meet your needs, converting
destructive power into a small amount of combat boost. Of course, this charm will not occupy your precious slots, and whether or not to equip it is entirely up to your choice.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.void_tome.pag: This extraordinary book lies quietly in a corner of the overworld, waiting for those who crave knowledge to find its existence.<br2/>Once you open this ominous book, your brain seems to be connected to an endless void, with a large number of intangible things flooding into your mind, dispersing all perceptions and teasing every

nerve. It seems like whispering to you about the mysterious arcane...<br2/>When you come to your senses, the book disappears, leaving only a sharp headache and a new understanding of the Arcane Scroll
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.antiqueBag1: §5A container similar to a Ender Chest.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.antiqueBag2: §5The books stored in will be considered
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.antique_bag.p: This is another mysterious relic that can be found in the midst of nameless ruins. It emits a faint magical light in its dim appearance, just like this ordinary cloth bag, but inside it there is a mysterious magical space.<br2/>But this relic seems to have its own temper, only reluctantly accepting when you put in a book.

However, miraculously, every time you store a book, some knowledge that does not belong to you immediately comes to mind. This can greatly save storage space and allow some items that are not working on their own to take effect.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.astralPotion2: §4You think you shouldn't drink too much...
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.astral_potion: Star dust has enormous potential in potion brewing, which you must have experienced before. But when faced with some unfamiliar potions, it seems that you cannot simply catalyze their stardust, let alone those effects that cannot be obtained from potions.<br2/>You turned your sight to honey.
From the results, it appears that this mysterious substance can prolong the duration of the potion effects on you. But if you want another bottle, emm, be careful of the consequences...
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.primeval_cube:
You have discovered this ancient record, which seems to be about the rebirth of spellstones.Under the catalysis of the radiance of the stars...
Six becomes one...
Accompanied by the power of two "Heart".
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.ichor_droplet: For this so-called "blood of gods", you have finally discovered a stable source to obtain, which is to hunt for screaming ghasts floating in the Nether.<br2/>The power of the curse triggered the tiny residual "divinity" in the blood and tears of the ghast, allowing the Ichor to reappear in front of everyone.

However, do not ponder where these 'divinity' actually comes from, as it has long been a secret of ancient times. For you now, all you need to think about is how to utilize and develop this unexpected product.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.ichoroot.name: Ichoroot
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.ichoroot.page: When people are arguing over carrots and potatoes, the neglected beetroot appears particularly pitiful. Now with the assistance of ichor, let it be refreshed!<br2/>Only a small amount of ichor is needed to double the nutrition of beetroot and make it easy to digest, while also demonstrating divinity and purification power within it.
Ichor can purify the negative effects and provide absorption. After consuming a certain amount, the protection of divinity will be revealed to resist certain harm for you.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.pure_heart.pa: With different materials, you may be able to try a production different from Twisted Heart. The combination of hidden dark pollution and faint divinity gave birth to this eerie creation with bright appearance.<br2/>Unlike another type of item, the Pure Heart and its creations typically provide protection and assistance,

rather than aggressive power.<br2/>But although it is a divine creation, it needs to rely on the power of curses, which is too ironic. So when using these items, please also pay attention to the hidden dangers.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.blessAmplifier1: §5Combine with any enchanted item in a crafting grid
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.bless_amplifi: After the baptism of Ichor, the desire for the book has transformed from acquisition to giving, further enhancing the magical power in the item.<br2/>If you allow it to come in close contact with any enchanted item, it'll sacrifice itself and double the level of enchantments in the item.

Breaking the limitations of the enchantments to a higher level is its true purpose.<br2/>By the way, not all limitation can be broken, and there are also some enchantments that cannot withstand the power and become ineffective.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.bless_stone.p: When you are hesitating whether to sacrifice yourself to break free from the Seven Curse Ring, there is a brand new choice in front of you.<br2/>The biggest problem is the Loss of Soul, and with the current materials and methods, it seems impossible. Although we can't break the connection, we could let the connection be presented in a new way.

Slowly infiltrate a little pure power into the Ring of Seven Curses, and mobilize the bless to change the curses. However, all these operations still need to be carried out when the contact is vulnerable, that is, you need to face death.

After the final soul loss, the Ring of Seven Curses will completely disappear from your sight and turn into a touch of gold on your hand.<br2/>The previous curses has completely disappeared, also the original bless has been partially preserved. Although most of the objects that once

accompanied you are no longer usable, there are still some things that bear witness to your past filled with suffering, which is constantly approaching death. They still recognize your qualifications, are willing to break the shackles of the curse for you. <br2/>May you enjoy life to the fullest on days away from the curses.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.blessRing4: §5- Increase the damage you cause by §6%1$s
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.blessRing9: §5- You can create and use unique relics.
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.blessRingLore3: §5of torment, and also, it is a
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.blessUse1: This item understands your past experiences,
tooltip.enigmaticaddons.blessUse2: and it still recognizes your qualifications.
death.attack.false_justice: %1$s disappeared into the void of judgement.
book.enigmaticaddons.entry.frozen_heart_: Blue ice, the purest existence in the ice block family. After careful consideration, you decided to add it to the brewing process as an attempt.<br2/>After tasting, although it is too cold, you find that there is no feeling of coldness in your body. Instead, it allows you to feel the power from those cold air in the snowy mountains and glaciers.
Ultimately, you will gain the ability to immune freeze and be able to apply a cold aura to others, and deal more damage to those frozen targets.
Its effect can be extended using redstone dust.
You can also brew it into splash...
...or lingering types, just like you can any other regular potion.
